About

About

Hi, I’m Matt Black.

I’m the cofounder of Atomic Finance, a bitcoin defi company focused on building non-custodial financial tools using Discreet Log Contracts (DLCs).

Maintainer of node-dlc and bitcoin-abstraction-layer

Created Atomic Odds for betting on Trump vs Biden using DLCs

Built Atomic Loans for getting Bitcoin-backed loans using native-BTC

Author of BIP 197, ERC 1850 and ERC 1630

Built Cross-Chain Atomic Swaps with Liquality

Presentations

Infrastructure Pitch Day @ Bitcoin ‘23 Miami

Building the future Finance on Bitcoin @ Bitcoin Summer in Montreal Conference ‘22

Podcasts

SLP #519 Oct 2023

TFTC #436 Jul 2023

BOB $120 Jul 2023

TLS #114 Jul 2023

Blockware Podcast Mar 2023

TFTC #193 Sep 2020

HashR8 Apr 2020
